mapper.select: select no, subject, id, hit, date_format(writedate, '%m-%d %h:%i') writedate from board_community where id = #{param1} order by no desc
select no, subject, id, hit, date_format(writedate, '%m-%d %h:%i') writedate from board_question where id = #{param1} order by no desc
select no, subject, id, hit, date_format(writedate, '%m-%d %h:%i') writedate from board_customerservice where id = #{param1} order by no desc

select course.course_no, course.course_name, course.distance, course.time, course.type, detail.addr from
( select course_no, course_name, distance,time, type from course where id = #{param1} ) course
left outer join
(select course_no, addr from course_detail where waypoint = 0 ) detail on course.course_no = detail.course_no
